section.title: About this document
section.para: This document describes the internals of AEditor that an AEditor-developer needs to know. It assumes knowledge of Ruby. This document is a work in progress.

section.title: Synopsis
section.para: Reading this manual will hopefully provide you with enough understanding of AEditor's internals, so that you will be able to specialize/extend AEditor for your own needs.

section.title: Audience and purpose
section.para: This document is intented for people who want to embed the AEditor widget into their editor. Also developers who want to tweak AEditor's internals. Myself as a reminder of how things is working.

section.title: How to use this document
section.para: Read it and mail me comments and suggestions.

listitem.para: The best OO programming language so far (my opinion). AEditor is written in Ruby.
